snippet: To the Editor:         Ward Connerly (Op-Ed, April 29) states that affirmative action was never meant to be a permanent solution to discrimination in schools. However, he glosses over the real solution, which is providing a better elementary and s...
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Ward Connerly (Op-Ed, April 29) states that affirmative action was never meant to be a permanent solution to discrimination in schools. However, he glosses over the real solution, which is providing a better elementary and secondary education for all children.

headline.main: Affirmative Action Is No Bar to Ambition
